title: Chandbali Jhumka - The 'Poorna Chandra' Earrings of Radiance
materials: South Sea Pearl. Features Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring luster.
features: Classic Chandbali design inspired by the crescent moon, intricately crafted with delicate filigree and embellished with dazzling diamonds. Features a central ruby, hanging South Sea pearl, and three emerald pendants. The openwork lattice design is characteristic of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship. Settings feature a Pave style for maximum diamond sparkle.
occasions: and other festive celebrations. Also perfect for modern Indian events and grand parties where a touch of tradition is desired. Suited for events like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions.
description: A timeless piece combining the elegance of Chandbali with the playfulness of Jhumka. The combination of Rubies, Emeralds, and South Sea Pearls is considered highly auspicious in South Indian culture. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring a high-quality and durable heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a long-lasting shine.
